title: 5x20Min Ques Due to The Whole Bug Splat Thing
body: So pissed off i do not deserve the lower priority ques for something that is the clients fault, absolutely unfair. didn't even give me a choice to reconnect.

replies.body:
JUST AND UPDATE
i now have another 5x20min ques for no reason. this game omg.
I was the first person with this issue to my knowledge, just re install and it should fix it
Did you try repairing the client at all or just do nothing and expext it to fix itself?
